name: Eat Town.io
description:
Indulge in a guilt-free act of gluttony, devour a full town!

All you can eat! Buildings, houses, pizzas, inhabitants and their dogs, cars, EIFFEL TOWER! everything!!

Other players too, become the biggest of all and enter fever mode where you'll be able to gulp at an unprecedented rate!

Satisfy that never ending hunger in a snack sized, 8 players game session.

*** Zero calories ***


--- By the creators of Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold (over 4 million players, Apple Featured), Save the Furries (over 1 million players, Apple Featured) ---
